channel.title: Save On The Ray-Ban RX5228
channel.description: Ray-Ban was started in 1937 by German company Bausch & Lomb. Lieutenant John Macready was a pilot in the US Air Force. After a trip where his eyes were exposed to the sun for long periods, he came back and complained his eyes had suffered permanent damage. He approached Bausch & Lomb and asked them [...]
